description: Twenty-five percent of the purchase price of this unisex sweater, which is part of Ralph Lauren's exclusive Pride capsule collection, will be donated to Stonewall Community Foundation, benefiting an international network of LGBTQIA+ organizations. To learn more about Stonewall Community Foundation, go to StonewallFoundation.org.
fitting_details: The fit of this unisex sweater is similar to that of Ralph Lauren's women's sweaters. We suggest customers who typically order our women's sweaters to order their usual size.
We suggest customers who typically order Ralph Lauren's men's sweaters to order two sizes larger than their usual size.
Size medium has a 23½" body length, a 35" chest, a 29" shoulder, and a 24½" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Signature rainbow flag and "RL" at the center front chest.
